chapter.text: 69|1|Tashikana shinjitsu,
69|2|tashikana shinjitsu to wa nani ka.
69|3|Tashikana shinjitsu ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka.
69|4|Samudo to ado (no min) wa, totsuzen kuru saiyaku o kyogidearu to shita.
69|5|Sore de samudo wa raiun no arashi ni yotte horobosa reta.
69|6|Mata ado wa unari kuruu kaze ni yotte horobosa reta.
69|7|Yoru 8-nichi ni watari, kare-ra ni taishi taema naku (arashi ga) osoi, sore de kuchita natsumeyashi no ki no yo ni,(subete no) min ga soko ni taorete iru no o, anata wa mitadearou.
69|8|Sorede anata wa, kare-ra no naka, dare ka nokotte iru mono o miru no ka.
69|9|Mata firuaun ya kare izen no mono ya horobosa reta sho toshi (no min) mo, tsumi o okashite ita.
69|10|Kare-ra wa omo no shito ni shitagawanainode, kare wa moretsuna chobatsu de kare-ra o shobatsu shita.
69|11|Omizu no toki, ware ga hakobune de anata gata o hakonda no wa,
69|12|sore o anata gata e no kyokun to sa se, chuibukai mimi ga sore o (kii te) kioku ni todomeru tamedearu.
69|13|Sore de rappa ga ichi fuki fuka reta toki,
69|14|daichi ya yamayama wa mochiage rare, ichigeki de konagona ni kudaka re,
69|15|sonohi (ichidai) jiken ga okoru.
69|16|Mata ozora wa chiji ni sakeru. Ten ga moroku yowai hidearou.
69|17|Tenshi-tachi wa, sono (ten no) hashibashi ni ori, sonohi, 8-ri (no tenshi) ga kare-ra no ue ni, anata no omo no gyokuza o ninaudearou.
69|18|Sonohi anata gata wa (shinpan no tame) mina Ââù Ki-dashi ni sa re nanihitotsu to shite kakushi osenaidearou.
69|19|Sore de migite ni sono (gyojo)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `Koko ni (kite), anata gata wa watashi no (gyojo)-ki o yome.'
69|20|`Izure watashi (shinja) no seisan (shinpan) ni au koto ga, hontoni wakatte ita.'
69|21|Koshite kare wa shifukuna seikatsu ni hitari,
69|22|takai (oka no)-en no naka de,
69|23|samazamana kajitsu ga tedjika ni aru.
69|24|`Anata gata wa, sugisatta hi (gense) de okonatta (zenko no) tame ni, man'etsu shite tabe, katsu nome.'(To iwa reyou)
69|25|daga hidarite ni sono (gyojo)-ki o watasa reru mono wa iu. `A , watashi no (gyojo)-ki ga watasa renakattanaraba.'
69|26|`Watashi wa jibun no seisan ga, don'na monodearu ka o shiranakatta.'
69|27|A, sono (shi) ga,(watashi no) shumatsudeattanaraba,
69|28|tomi wa, watashi ni yakudatanakatta.
69|29|`Ken'i wa, watashi katara kieusete shimatta.'
69|30|(Daga genmei ga kudarou. ) `Kare o toraete, shibare.'
69|31|Sore kara moesakaru hi de, kare o yake.
69|32|Sarani 70 wanshaku no naga-sa no kusari de., Kare o make.
69|33|Hontoni kare wa, idainaru arra o shinjizu,
69|34|mata hinja o yashinau koto o susumenakatta.
69|35|Sorede kono hi kare wa, soko ni tomo wa naku,
69|36|mata, kegarawashi fuhai-mono no soto ni shokumotsu wanai,
69|37|`sore o taberu no wa, tsumibito dakedearu.'
69|38|Ware wa, anata gataga mi eru mono ni oite chikai,
69|39|mata anata gataga mi enai mono ni oite chikau.
69|40|Hontoni kore wa, sonkina shito no kotobadearu.
69|41|Kore wa shijin no kotobade wanai. Daga anata gata wa, hotondo shinjinai.
69|42|Mata, uranaishi no kotoba demonai. Shikashi anata gata wa hotondo ki ni moshi nai.
69|43|(Koreha) ban'yu no nushi kara kudasa reta keijidearu.
69|44|Moshi kare (shito) ga, ware ni kanshite nanrakano kotoba o netsuzo surunaraba,
69|45|ware wa kitto kare no migite o torae,
69|46|kare no keidomyaku o kanarazu kirudearou.
69|47|Anata gata no naka, darehitori, kare o mamotte yarenai nodearu.
69|48|Hontoni kore wa,-nushi o osoreru mono e no kunkaidearu.
69|49|Ware wa anata gata no naka,(sore o) kyohi suru mono o shiru.
69|50|Hontoni kono (kuruan) wa, fushin-sha ni totte wa kanashimi (no tane)dearou.
69|51|Daga sore wa, hontoni kakkotaru fudo no shinridearu.
69|52|Dakara shidainaru okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai.
